title: cssFlexboxGuide
description: Learn how to create responsive layouts using CSS Flexbox.
author: Alice Johnson
content: CSS Flexbox is a powerful layout module that enables you to align and distribute space among items in a container. It's perfect for creating responsive designsNode.js is an open-source, cross-platform runtime environment for executing JavaScript code outside of a browser.
